title: Agreement of Economic and Technical Co-operation between the Government of Sri Lanka and the Government of  the People?s Republic of China
decision_details: - the Chinese Government has agreed to provide a grant of  Renminbi Yuan 100 million to Sri Lanka, to further enhancing friendly relation and bilateral economic and technical co-operation between the two countries.  The proposal made by H.E. the President, in his capacity as the Minister of Finance and Planning, to enter into the relevant agreement, was approved by the Cabinet.
